Linux.name: python
commands:
cd /opt/python_runtime/chatbot_prod/
export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:$PWD
export PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8
cd api
nohup python2.7 chatbot_engine.py&

Linux.name: python
commands:
cd /opt/python_runtime/chat_bot_app/
export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:$PWD
export PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8
cd api
nohup python2.7 api_webhook.py&
